Header: Over 100kg of Heroin seized in Navy, Narcotics Bureau raid
Content: A raid conducted by the Police Narcotics Bureau together with the Sri Lanka Navy in the southern seas resulted in theÂ seizure 101 kilogrammes of Heroin According to the Navy Media Unit, the discovery of this haul of drugs was made when a suspicious vessel was subjected to an inspection. Several Afhgan and Pakistani nationals have been arrested along with the haul.The suspects and the seized haul of Heroin have been handed over to the Police Narcotics Bureau for further investigations.
